headline: Wall Street analysts downgrade Becton Dickinson & Co. as ’confidence eroded’
summary: Investing.com -- Becton Dickinson & Co. was hit with downgrades from both Goldman Sachs and Piper Sandler on Thursday, as analysts cited weakening organic growth, repeated revenue misses, and eroding confidence in management’s outlook.
